title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Digital Game-Based Pedagogy Workshop for Children with Language Delay

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the impact of digital game-based instructional methods on improving language skills in children with language delays.
Learners can design three mobile-friendly game activities to promote language development.
Learners can propose strategies to prevent attention distraction and overdependence issues that may arise when using games.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
